name: Light Duel GGJ/KrakJam 2022
description:
Duel game on a KrakJam - a part of Global Game Jam 2022.

The theme was duality. Idea is to show a duality of light with this little game. Light (a laser beam) will respond in different ways depending on what it hits. 

You can play with friends or against the computer (added after jam :) ).

Hope you will have some fun.

Cheers!
